game.name: Ironweld
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Combat feedback exaggerates as you fight in this 2D Mech Action RPG. Every hit intensifies visual impacts. Sounds rumble louder. Your attacks grow stronger. Overwhelm enemies before you overheat. Build your mech from parts and moves. Fight to unite mechs in a world running out of iron.
